items.title: Risk Management Professional - PMI-RMP Practice Exam.

visible_instructors.title: Ahmed Atif Sherif
visible_instructors.name: Ahmed Atif
visible_instructors.job_title: Project Control Engr.| PMP®| PMI-RMP®| PMO-CP®| PRMG

items.headline: General Questions Tests + Tools /Techniques (Appendix-D) Questions Tests
objectives_summary: Are you ready to pass the PMI-RMP Exam?  Don't worry you will get what you want here. This course will cover the 5 domains as per the Project management institute: •	Risk Strategy and Planning  •	Stakeholder Engagement  •	Risk Process Facilitation  •	Risk Monitoring and Reporting  •	Perform Specialized Risk Activities.     Tools and Techniques of risk management processes are very important and are tested many times on the real PMI-RMP exam. Risk management tools and techniques are not stated in one book some of them are in the PMBOK Guide and others are in the Practice Standard for Project Risk Management. You will see in the exam some tools and techniques that are not mentioned in the previous books such as Crawford Slip Method (CSM), Pre-mortem, Latin Hypercube ….. etc. Solve and understand all questions in  these practice exams and I am sure you will be able to solve many questions in the real exam. Good luck.
